description:
Autocomplete is a select box that allows users to search the available options. 
Optimal for when there are many options to choose from

variable_name.description: Optional variable name associated with a component
variable_name.title: Variable Name

items.description: Options for the autocomplete box. Can be a list of strings or integers
items.title: Items

value.description: Selected option for the autocomplete box
value.title: Value

multiple.description: Determines if multiple selections are allowed
multiple.title: Multiple

clearable.description: Determines if the autocomplete box has a clearable option
clearable.title: Clearable

disabled.description: Determines if the autocomplete box is disabled
disabled.title: Disabled

readonly.description: Determines if the autocomplete box is read-only
readonly.title: Readonly

color.description: Color of the autocomplete component. Can be custom or standard Material color
color.title: Color

triggerEvent.description: Trigger event for when to run based on the selected value
triggerEvent.title: Triggerevent

title: Autocomplete
